title: Students' tech savvy on display Tuesday at Highlands - TribLIVE
content: Students' tech savvy on display Tuesday at Highlands  TribLIVE
description: Using Bee Bots, Puzzlets and Snap Circuits, Highlands students of all ages will be showing off their science savvy during a free event Tuesday. The Technology Showcase highlights innovative lessons that students experience each day in the classroom through technology, engineering and computer science, said organizer Andrew Lynch, a teacher
